title: Baxter Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire Synovis
description: Baxter Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire Synovis DEERFIELD, Ill. & ST. PAUL, Minn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) and Synovis Life Technologies, Inc.
